name: Cherna
description:
There is a giant wormhole in space, sucking everything into it and slowly collapsing on itself. Your spaceship got caught by its force but you can resist. Try to survive until the hole has collapsed!

How to play

Slow down your spaceship by holding Space and use your mouse to move around and collect orbs to refill your energy level. Orbs will get attracted to your ship when you stop slowing down.
While you are slowing down, you are vulnerable to high-speed asteroids, which take away your energy.
